server.definition: SELECT * FROM ENT_VRSN_TBL WHERE OBSLT_UTC IS NULL AND STS_CD_ID <> '39995C08-0A5C-4549-8BA7-D187F9B3C4FD' AND ENT_ID IN ( WITH cte_ents AS ( -- ALL ENTITIES ASSIGNED TO MY FACILITY SELECT SRC_ENT_ID FROM ENT_REL_PART_DSDL_TBL WHERE TRG_ENT_ID = $placeid$ ) SELECT ENT_ID FROM ACT_PTCPT_PART_RCT_TBL WHERE ACT_ID IN (SELECT ACT_ID FROM ACT_PTCPT_PART_LOC_TBL WHERE ENT_ID = $placeid$) AND ENT_ID NOT IN (SELECT SRC_ENT_ID FROM cte_ents) )
